item.title: Time Only Goes One Way. Nobody Knows Why.
item.description:
Time only goes one way.

You already knew that. Your coffee gets cold. Your eggs don’t unscramble. Your dead grandmother doesn’t come back. You knew this before you knew the word “entropy.” It’s written into everything â€” into the fact that your memories are of the past, not the future, into the fact that you know which way to hold a video to make it look fake.

Here’s what you probably didn’t know: the laws of physics don’t see it that way.
